text: Howard Henry Tooth, CMG, CB (22 April 1856â€“1925) was a British neurologist. He was one of the scientists who discovered Charcot-Marie-Tooth disease.The British Medical Journal May 23 1925 Tooth died from a cerebral hemorrhage in Hadleigh, Suffolk, England. ==References== Category:1856 births Category:1925 deaths Category:British neurologists
title: Howard Henry Tooth
